summary: Provides Python wrappers for GDAL/OGR envelope structures, exposing a rectangular bounding box defined by minimum and maximum X/Y coordinates. The classes allow access to each edge, expansion to include additional geometries, and conversion to common representations such as tuples and WKT strings.
business_intent: Enable Django GIS applications to manage and manipulate geometry bounding boxes through a highâ€‘level, Pythonic interface to the underlying GDAL library, supporting spatial queries, indexing, and coordinate transformations.
